trans-unit.source: How to Create a MongoDB Database in Azure
trans-unit.target: How to Create a MongoDB Database in Azure

trans-unit.source: This article will show you how to use [MongoLab] to create a MongoDB database from the [Azure Store].
trans-unit.target: This article will show you how to use [MongoLab] to create a MongoDB database from the [Azure Store].

trans-unit.source: [MongoLab] is a MongoDB-as-a-service provider that allows you to run and manage MongoDB databases in Azure datacenters and connect to them from any application.
trans-unit.target: [MongoLab] is a MongoDB-as-a-service provider that allows you to run and manage MongoDB databases in Azure datacenters and connect to them from any application.

trans-unit.source: To create a MongoDB database from the [Azure Store], do the following:
trans-unit.target: To create a MongoDB database from the [Azure Store], do the following:

trans-unit.source: Log in to the [Azure Management Portal][portal].
trans-unit.target: Log in to the [Azure Management Portal][portal].

trans-unit.source: Click **+NEW** at the bottom of the page, then select **STORE**.
trans-unit.target: Click **+NEW** at the bottom of the page, then select **STORE**.

trans-unit.source: Select **MongoLab**, then click the arrow at the bottom of the frame.
trans-unit.target: Select **MongoLab**, then click the arrow at the bottom of the frame.

trans-unit.source: Enter a database name, and select a region, then click the arrow at the bottom of the frame.
trans-unit.target: Enter a database name, and select a region, then click the arrow at the bottom of the frame.

trans-unit.source: Click the checkmark to complete your purchase.
trans-unit.target: Click the checkmark to complete your purchase.

trans-unit.source: After your database has been created, you can manage it from the **ADD-ONS** tab in the management portal.
trans-unit.target: After your database has been created, you can manage it from the **ADD-ONS** tab in the management portal.

trans-unit.source: Manage MongoLab database in Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Manage MongoLab database in Azure portal

trans-unit.source: You can get the database connection information by clicking on **CONNECTION INFO** at the bottom of the page (shown above).
trans-unit.target: You can get the database connection information by clicking on **CONNECTION INFO** at the bottom of the page (shown above).
